description: Residents of the town, which is still vacated, are waiting for the demolition and assessments that will allow them to rebuild in earnest.
title: Coming Back: Ortley Beach
title_page: Coming Back: Ortley Beach - The New York Times
text: In Ortley Beach, N.J., Mike Pedano, known around town as Uncle Mike, is working to rehabilitate the beach house that he and his cousin built. It was days away from a certificate of occupancy when Hurricane Sandy hit.
